programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When Paul Shealey is found shot in the head in a creek, there's no shortage of suspects. As detectives learn about Paul’s criminal past, multiple exes, and flashy lifestyle, it seems like he may have been just an easy target. But as the case unfolds the actual killer turns out to be the most unlikely criminal mastermind.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When single mom Amber Owens disappears, police uncover a slew of complicated relationships involving her children’s father, her new boyfriend, and the women both men were seeing on the side. After her body is found, detectives must figure out if someone caught up in the multiple love triangles was jealous enough to kill.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Flirting with Danger
programme.desc: A frantic 911 call leads investigators to the scene of a brutal double-homicide, just outside of Atlanta. As police hunt for clues, a run of the mill traffic stop leads them to a surprising suspect: a young woman with a promising future and no criminal record. That�s when they begin to unravel a deadly plot fueled by love, desperation, and the young woman�s desire to take care of her man�.no matter the cost.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Crossing the Line
programme.desc: The murder of a new mother shocks a quiet community, especially when investigators learn that her estranged Army sergeant husband has an airtight alibi. But soon, a twisted love triangle emerges, one in which another young woman will cross the line for her man � no matter the cost.

programme.title: ATL Homicide
programme.sub-title: ATL Homicide - Disrespecting Mamma: Dexter Freeman
programme.desc: Shots ring out and leave a man dead. Quinn and Vince learn that this house on a quiet street was actually involved in the local drug trade, leaving detectives wondering if this is a case of a disgruntled customer or something more sinister.

programme.title: ATL Homicide
programme.sub-title: ATL Homicide - Teen Terror: Timothy Reeves
programme.desc: A young man is killed in a complex in Dixie Hills. Quinn and Vince are unable to identify their victim and have little to go on. Detectives receive a tip about a teen with a violent past and a penchant for bragging about his more murderous exploits.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When a hard-working mother of three disappears during her lunch hour, investigators wonder who could have targeted her – and why? After police finally find her body dumped in a field, they shift their focus to the men in her life.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: After a beloved family of seven is firebombed in their sleep in the Baltimore neighborhood of Oliver, the Baltimore City Police fall under intense scrutiny, ultimately bearing as much blame from the community as the killer himself.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: Long standing racial tensions in Brooklyn�s Bensonhurst neighborhood explode into months of protests after an unarmed Black teenager named Yusuf Hawkins is pursued, shot, and killed by a mob determined to send a message to Black communities throughout New York.

programme.title: Find Our Missing
programme.sub-title: Find Our Missing - Asha Degree/ Kelly Allen
programme.desc: A loving, athletic girl goes missing from her home in Shelby, NC on Valentine�s Day. - A 20-year old woman goes missing from a friend�s apartment in St. Louis, but 5 years later a cousin thinks he sees her on a train.

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: A woman from Queens suspects that the sexual abuse she suffered is about to repeat itself with her nieces, so she seeks retribution to ensure her abuser will never harm anyone else.

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: At first, Baltimore police write off the murder of a struggling addict as just another drug deal gone wrong; however, the victim's daughter starts to see red flags among loved ones she thought she could trust.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Hiding in Plain Sight
programme.desc: When LaJoya McCoy’s close-knit family requests a welfare check after they haven’t heard from her in days, all signs point to foul play. Investigators race to find the missing mother of two – dead or alive. But the grisly truth is as hard to fathom as the monster hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Killer on the Run
programme.desc: When a young single mother goes missing, police focus on the men in her life: her child’s father, a disappointed ex, and her current boyfriend. But the investigation takes a new direction when her boyfriend is also nowhere to be found. Is he another victim – or a killer on the run?
